doc:
James P. Connolly https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_P._Connolly 0 James P. Connolly is an American comedian and tv/radio host known for his frequent guest appearances on the nationally syndicated Bob and Tom Radio Show, former host of VH1's Movie Obsessions and the host of We Are The Mighty. In 2002, Connolly was named Grand Comedy Champion on Next Big Star on TV Talent show hosted by Ed McMahon. He is one of the most played comedians on Sirius XM Comedy and a sought after host for Fortune 500 companies and global events. Connolly's smart, playful style and smooth commanding voice often draw comparison to comedian Steve Martin. He is one of the_most_played_comedians on Sirius_XM_Comedy and a sought after host for Fortune_500_companies and global_events . Connolly 's_smart_,_playful_style and smooth commanding_voice often draw comparison to comedian_Steve_Martin .
